document.full_text: a jewish couple and three of their children were stabbed to death in bed in a west bank settlement in what israeli officials said saturday was an attack by one or more palestinians who broke into their home.
document.title: jewish couple and three children killed in west bank
lines_and_colors: a jewish couple and three of their children were stabbed to death in bed in a west bank settlement in what israeli officials said saturday was an attack by one or more palestinians who broke into their home.
